sourcesContent:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Profile</title>
</head>
<body>
    <form action="{{ url_for('profile') }}" method="POST">
        <label for="username">Username:</label>required
        <input type="text" name="username" value="{{ username }}"  value="{{ user[0] }}" required>
        <label for="name">Name:</label>
        <input type="text" name="name" value="{{ name }}" required value="{{ user[1] }}"  required>
        <label for="name">Surname:</label>
        <input type="text" name="surname" value="{{ surname }}" required value="{{ user[2] }}" required>
        <label for="email">Email:</label>
        <input type="email" name="email" value="{{ email }}" required value="{{ user[3] }}"  required>
        <label for="password">Password:</label>
        <input type="password" name="password" value="{{ password }}" required>
        <label for="password">Confirm password:</label>
        <input type="password" name="confirmPassword" value="{{ confirmPassword }}" required>
        <input type="submit" value="Update">
    </form>
</body>
</html>
